summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the subdivision and re-subdivision of land in the City of Seattle, amending Sections 13.05, 13.06, 15.01, 15.02, 18, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29 and 30 of Ordinance 105636, the Subdivision Ordinance, (Sections 24.98.180, 24.98.190, 24.98.300, 24.98.310, 24.98.350, 24.98.430, 24.98.440, 24.98.450, 24.98.460, 24.98.470, 24.98.480, 24.98.490, 24.98.500, 24.98.510, 24.98.520, and 24.98.530 of the Seattle Municipal Code) transferring duties and responsibilities of the City Engineer and Board of Public Works to the Director of Engineering and Superintendent of Water.
